Package org.dspace.app.xmlui.utils

Class Summary
AuthenticationUtil Methods for authenticating the user.
ContextUtil Miscellaneous UI utility methods methods for managing DSpace context.
DSpaceValidity This is a validity object specifically implemented for the caching needs of DSpace, Manakin, and Cocoon.
FeedUtils Utility functions and data in common to all producers of syndication feeds in the XMLUI -- e.g.
FlowscriptUtils  
HandleUtil Simple utility class for extracting handles.
JQueryLoaderReader Loads in the jquery javascript library if it hasn't been loaded in already
RequestInfo Stores information about an HTTP request.
RequestUtils General utilities for common operations on Request objects.
XSLUtils Utilities that are needed in XSL transformations.
 

Exception Summary
BadRequestException Exception thrown in case of bad request syntax Example: invalid/missing parameters, ...
UIException A class representing an error generated by the Manakin.
